      Methods in flocksimulator.benchmark.mock that return Vector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector MockAgent.alignment(FlockList<Agent> agents)
      Method for creating average velocity of other agents within view radius of this agent, and creating a steering force to correct this agents heading based on that average.
      Vector MockAgent.cohesion(FlockList<Agent> agents)
      Method for creating a force to be attracted to center of flock made of other agents if they are within the view radius of this agent.
      Vector MockAgent.separation(FlockList<Agent> agents)
      Method for creating a force by which to repel from other agents based on their distance if they are within the view radius of this agent.
